# uniflow-micros
Network infrastructure micro services


##### ENV variables
```
UNICONFIG_URL_BASE
ELASTICSEACRH_URL_BASE
CONDUCTOR_URL_BASE
INVENTORY_URL_BASE
INFLUXDB_URL_BASE
UNIRESOURCE_URL_BASE
UNICONFIG_USER
UNICONFIG_PASSWD
X_TENANT_ID
X_FROM
X_AUTH_USER_GROUP
```
e.g.:
Uniconfig host can be configured in env.:```UNICONFIG_URL_BASE=http://uniconfig:8181/rests```
